exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of an invoice.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

vat_payment_suspension.title: Vat payment suspension
vat_payment_suspension.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

created.title: Created on

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

custom_id.title: Custom ID
custom_id.description: Assign a custom ID for easier identification and integration with external systems. This field is optional and can be used to reference records according to your own internal identifiers.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: The recurring frequency's interval. Please see the [recurring schedule](#tag/recurringinvoices) for more information.

period.title: Period

next_execution.title: Next execution

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of an invoice.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

vat_payment_suspension.title: Vat payment suspension
vat_payment_suspension.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

created.title: Created on
created.description: ISO-formatted creation date & time. Timezone information is included.

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

custom_id.title: Custom ID
custom_id.description: Assign a custom ID for easier identification and integration with external systems. This field is optional and can be used to reference records according to your own internal identifiers.

start_datetime.title: Start date
start_datetime.description: When should the first invoice be created. Timezone information is included.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: The recurring frequency's interval. Please see the [recurring schedule](#tag/recurringinvoices) for more information.

period.title: Period
period.description:
The recurring frequency's period. Please see the [recurring schedule](#tag/recurringinvoices) for more information. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
daysDays
weeksWeeks
monthsMonths

end_datetime.title: End date
end_datetime.description: When should the last invoice be created. Leave this blank for the recurring schedule to never expire. Timezone information is included.

last_execution.title: Last execution
last_execution.description: When was the last invoice created. Automatically calculated datetime. Timezone information is included.

next_execution.title: Next execution
next_execution.description: When will the next invoice be created. Automatically calculated datetime.

paused.title: Paused
paused.description: While the record is paused new records will not be created.

documenttype.title: Document type
documenttype.description: ID of the associated document type.

mydata_document_type.title: MyDATA document type
mydata_document_type.description:
Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
1.1Sales Invoice
1.2Sales Invoice / Intra-community Supplies
1.3Sales Invoice / Third Country Supplies
2.1Service Rendered Invoice
2.2Intra-community Service Rendered Invoice
2.3Third Country Service Rendered Invoice
6.1Self-Delivery Record
6.2Self-Supply Record
11.1Retail Sales Receipt
11.2Service Rendered Receipt
11.3Simplified Invoice

is_b2g.title: Is B2G document
is_b2g.description: Invoices and credit notes associated with public contracts are required to be sent electronically. The `is_b2g` field indicates that the document falls under this category. This feature is available only to organizations that have activated the integration with the certified eInvoicing service.

draft.title: Draft
draft.description: Whether the generated documents will be in draft mode.

auto_email.title: Email created invoices to the client
auto_email.description: Email issued invoices to the client. Draft field needs to be false.

auto_email_attach_pdf.title: Attach the invoice PDF to the email message
auto_email_attach_pdf.description: This option is available when the `auto_email` option is enabled.

due_days.title: Due days
due_days.description: Days after the issue date, that a commercial document will be considered overdue. This affects the commercial document's due date. You may leave the field blank if you do not want to apply credit.

template.title: Template
template.description: ID of the template that will be used to render the created invoices.

client_display_name.title: Client name
client_display_name.description: If not provided, the client name will be retrieved from the specified client contact

client_profession.title: Client profession
client_profession.description: The client profession, as it will appear on the PDF.

client_vat_number.description: The client tax ID, as it will appear on the PDF.

client_contact_person.title: Contact person
client_contact_person.description: The client's contact person, as it will appear on the PDF.

client_phone_number.title: Phone number
client_phone_number.description: The client phone number, as it will appear on the PDF.

client_email.title: Email
client_email.description: The client email address, as it will appear on the PDF.

client_authority.title: Contracting authority
client_authority.description: The Contracting Authority of Electronic Invoicing (CAEI) name, as published in the official registry. This field applies only to B2G documents (the `is_b2g` field is set to `true`).

client_authority_code.title: Contracting authority code
client_authority_code.description: The Contracting Authority of Electronic Invoicing (CAEI) code, as published in the official registry. This field applies only to B2G documents (the `is_b2g` field is set to `true`).

client_authority_vat_number.title: CAEI Tax ID
client_authority_vat_number.description: The Contracting Authority of Electronic Invoicing (CAEI) VAT ID, as published in the official registry. This field applies only to B2G documents (the `is_b2g` field is set to `true`).

client_contract_budget_type.title: Contract budget type
client_contract_budget_type.description:
The budget category that the invoiced public contract falls under. This field applies only to B2G documents (the `is_b2g` field is set to `true`). One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
1Regular budget
2Public Investment Programme
3Other budget

client_contract_type_code.title: ADA / PDE code
client_contract_type_code.description: Fill in the number of online publication (ADA) or the PDE code. If the corresponding code is not available, you may leave this field empty as long as the contract type is set to "Other budget". This field applies only to B2G documents (the `is_b2g` field is set to `true`).

client_contract_reference_code.title: ADAM code
client_contract_reference_code.description: The public contract reference code (ADAM). This field applies only to B2G documents (the `is_b2g` field is set to `true`).

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of an invoice.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: The list of taxes that have been applied to the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: The list of applied withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

vat_payment_suspension.title: Vat payment suspension
vat_payment_suspension.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

created.title: Created on
created.description: ISO-formatted creation date & time. Timezone information is included.

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

product.title: Product / Service
product.description: ID of the associated product / service.

title.title: Title
title.description: If not provided it will be retrieved from the related product.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 4 decimal places.

unit_measure.title: Unit of measurement
unit_measure.description:
The `symbol` of the corresponding unit of measurement. You may use the symbol of any custom unit, however the following options are always available:

itemItem
serviceService

tTon

hourHour
monthMonth
yearYear
man-hourMan-Hour
man-dayMan-Day
man-monthMan-Month
kilowatt-hourKilowatt hour
packagePackage
boxBox
m3Cubic metre
dayDay

unit_value.title: Unit value
unit_value.description: Used in the "initial" calculation mode. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

unit_discount.title: Unit discount
unit_discount.description: Absolute value, not percentage. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes that apply to this line.

unit_total.title: Unit total
unit_total.description: Used in the "total" calculation mode. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

item_net.title: Item net value
item_net.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

accounts.description: A list of myDATA classifications that apply to this line.

vat_exemption_category.description:

30Without VAT -Article 47c of the VAT Code (OSS EU scheme)
31Excluding VAT -Article 47d of the VAT Code (IOSS)

interval.title: Interval

last_execution.title: Last execution

next_execution.title: Next execution

paused.title: Paused

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of an invoice.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

vat_payment_suspension.title: Vat payment suspension
vat_payment_suspension.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of an invoice.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

vat_payment_suspension.title: Vat payment suspension
vat_payment_suspension.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

created.title: Created on
created.description: ISO-formatted creation date & time. Timezone information is included.

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

custom_id.title: Custom ID
custom_id.description: Assign a custom ID for easier identification and integration with external systems. This field is optional and can be used to reference records according to your own internal identifiers.

status.title: Status
status.description:
Automatically generated status. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
draftDraft
issuedIssued
partialPartially paid
paidPaid
pendingPending approval
voidVoid

draft.title: Draft
draft.description: If `true` the document is considered to be a work in progress.

documenttype.title: Document type
documenttype.description: Optionally, associate the record with a document type to denote the type of the received document. This field is required in case of a self-billed document.

mydata_document_type.title: MyDATA document type
mydata_document_type.description:
Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
5.1Credit Invoice / Associated
5.2Credit Invoice / Non-Associated

self_billed.title: Self-billed invoice
self_billed.description: Denotes whether this is a self-billed invoice. This value is auto-generated and depends on the bill's document type.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: A reference code. Usually, the document number as specified by the supplier.

date.title: Date
date.description: The issue date. Date is in the form of `YYYY-mm-dd`.

mydata_uid.title: UID
mydata_uid.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

mydata_qr_url.title: Mydata qr url
mydata_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a myDATA-hosted public page for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the Elorus integration.

mydata_latest_mark.title: Mydata latest mark
mydata_latest_mark.description: Unique submission ID from myDATA that indicates this document has been submitted.

mydata_latest_cancel_mark.title: Mydata latest cancel mark
mydata_latest_cancel_mark.description: If the latest submission has been canceled, this is the cancellation ID.

mydata_submission_status.title: Mydata submission status
mydata_submission_status.description:
Document status in relation to myDATA. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
sentThe document has been submitted to myDATA
not_sentThe document has not been submitted to myDATA yet
wont_sendThe document is subject to myDATA submission, but the user has explicitly requested that it not be sent via Elorus (e.g., it has already been submitted through another channel)
not_applicableThe document is not subject to myDATA submission

mydata_submission_channel.title: MyDATA submission channel
mydata_submission_channel.description:
One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
elorusElorus
impactIMPACT EINVOICING
softoneSoftOne EINVOICING

authentication_code.title: Authentication code
authentication_code.description: The authentication code is a unique identifier provided when a document is submitted to myDATA through a certified e-invoicing provider. This code ensures the authenticity of the document and can be used to verify its submission and validity within the e-invoicing service.

einvoicing_provider_qr_url.title: Einvoicing provider qr url
einvoicing_provider_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a public page hosted by the electronic invoicingservice provider for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the certified einvoicing provider.

permalink.title: Permalink
permalink.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. Public URL for clients.

created.title: Created on
created.description: ISO-formatted creation date & time. Timezone information is included.

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

PurchaseCreditNoteItemTaxNested.title: Taxes
PurchaseCreditNoteItemTaxNested.description: A list of taxes that apply to this line.

auto_calculate.title: Calculate automatically
auto_calculate.description: By default, Elorus performs calculations automatically. You can use this field to disable automatic calculations and then use the `amount` property to manually set the tax amount.

amount.title: Tax amount
amount.description: The tax amount is typically calculated automatically. However, if `auto_calculate` is set to `False`, you can use this field to specify the tax amount. If `auto_calculate` is `True`, this field will be ignored. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

vat_amount.title: VAT amount
vat_amount.description: In case the tax is subject to VAT, the VAT amount is automatically calculated and returned in this field. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

PurchaseCreditNoteItemAccountNested.title: Accounts
PurchaseCreditNoteItemAccountNested.description: A list of myDATA classifications that apply to this line.

PurchaseCreditNoteStandardTaxNested.title: Taxes
PurchaseCreditNoteStandardTaxNested.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

auto_calculate.title: Calculate automatically
auto_calculate.description: By default, Elorus performs calculations automatically. You can use this field to disable automatic calculations and then use the `amount` property to manually set the tax amount. If the tax is applied at the line level (i.e., included in a line’s `taxes` field), this setting is ignored, as the tax amount will be calculated based on the line totals.

amount.title: Tax amount
amount.description: The tax amount is typically calculated automatically. However, if `auto_calculate` is set to `False`, you can use this field to specify the tax amount. If `auto_calculate` is `True`, this field will be ignored. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

PurchaseCreditNoteWithholdingTaxNested.title: Withholding taxes
PurchaseCreditNoteWithholdingTaxNested.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

amount.title: Tax amount
amount.description: The amount is being automatically calculated, unless the associated tax is is a variable amount tax (the tax's `value_mode` is set to `dynamic`). In this case you must specify the tax amount yourself. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

subtotal.title: Subtotal
subtotal.description:
Set this field to a value other than `0`, to denote that a subtotal should be calculated. As a result, all subsequent withholding taxes (the taxes that follow in the list)will be calculated over this subtotal, rather than the document's net amount. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
0No subtotal
1Progressive up until this tax
2Includes this tax only

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of a supplier credit.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

paid.title: Paid
paid.description: Total paid amount. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

template.title: Template
template.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. The template to use when rendering to PDF.

public_notes.title: Public notes
public_notes.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. These notes will appear on the PDF.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

paid_on_receipt.title: Paid on receipt
paid_on_receipt.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

payment_method.title: Payment method
payment_method.description:
Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
1Domestic Payments Account
2Foreign Payments Account
3Cash
4Cheque
6Web Banking
7POS / e-POS
8IRIS Direct Payment

items.title: Related documents

mydata_uid.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

mydata_qr_url.title: Mydata qr url
mydata_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a myDATA-hosted public page for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the Elorus integration.

mydata_latest_mark.title: Mydata latest mark
mydata_latest_mark.description: Unique submission ID from myDATA that indicates this document has been submitted.

mydata_latest_cancel_mark.title: Mydata latest cancel mark
mydata_latest_cancel_mark.description: If the latest submission has been canceled, this is the cancellation ID.

mydata_submission_status.title: Mydata submission status
mydata_submission_status.description:
Document status in relation to myDATA. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
sentThe document has been submitted to myDATA
not_sentThe document has not been submitted to myDATA yet
wont_sendThe document is subject to myDATA submission, but the user has explicitly requested that it not be sent via Elorus (e.g., it has already been submitted through another channel)
not_applicableThe document is not subject to myDATA submission

mydata_submission_channel.title: MyDATA submission channel
mydata_submission_channel.description:
One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
elorusElorus
impactIMPACT EINVOICING
softoneSoftOne EINVOICING

authentication_code.title: Authentication code
authentication_code.description: The authentication code is a unique identifier provided when a document is submitted to myDATA through a certified e-invoicing provider. This code ensures the authenticity of the document and can be used to verify its submission and validity within the e-invoicing service.

einvoicing_provider_qr_url.title: Einvoicing provider qr url
einvoicing_provider_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a public page hosted by the electronic invoicingservice provider for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the certified einvoicing provider.

permalink.title: Permalink
permalink.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. Public URL for clients.

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of a supplier credit.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

paid.title: Paid
paid.description: Total paid amount. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

template.title: Template
template.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. The template to use when rendering to PDF.

public_notes.title: Public notes
public_notes.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. These notes will appear on the PDF.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

paid_on_receipt.title: Paid on receipt
paid_on_receipt.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

payment_method.title: Payment method
payment_method.description:
Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
1Domestic Payments Account
2Foreign Payments Account
3Cash
4Cheque
6Web Banking
7POS / e-POS
8IRIS Direct Payment

related_documents.description: A list of invoice IDs linked to this credit document. This information is solely for display purposes, it will appear on the PDF

items.title: Related documents
items.description: A list of invoice IDs linked to this credit document. This information is solely for display purposes, it will appear on the PDF

mydata_uid.title: UID
mydata_uid.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

mydata_qr_url.title: Mydata qr url
mydata_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a myDATA-hosted public page for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the Elorus integration.

mydata_latest_mark.title: Mydata latest mark
mydata_latest_mark.description: Unique submission ID from myDATA that indicates this document has been submitted.

mydata_latest_cancel_mark.title: Mydata latest cancel mark
mydata_latest_cancel_mark.description: If the latest submission has been canceled, this is the cancellation ID.

mydata_submission_status.title: Mydata submission status
mydata_submission_status.description:
Document status in relation to myDATA. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
sentThe document has been submitted to myDATA
not_sentThe document has not been submitted to myDATA yet
wont_sendThe document is subject to myDATA submission, but the user has explicitly requested that it not be sent via Elorus (e.g., it has already been submitted through another channel)
not_applicableThe document is not subject to myDATA submission

mydata_submission_channel.title: MyDATA submission channel
mydata_submission_channel.description:
One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
elorusElorus
impactIMPACT EINVOICING
softoneSoftOne EINVOICING

authentication_code.title: Authentication code
authentication_code.description: The authentication code is a unique identifier provided when a document is submitted to myDATA through a certified e-invoicing provider. This code ensures the authenticity of the document and can be used to verify its submission and validity within the e-invoicing service.

einvoicing_provider_qr_url.title: Einvoicing provider qr url
einvoicing_provider_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a public page hosted by the electronic invoicingservice provider for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the certified einvoicing provider.

permalink.title: Permalink
permalink.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. Public URL for clients.

created.title: Created on
created.description: ISO-formatted creation date & time. Timezone information is included.

modified.title: Modified on
modified.description: ISO-formatted last modification date & time. Timezone information is included.

V12PurchaseCreditNoteItemNestedRetrieveU.title: Line items
V12PurchaseCreditNoteItemNestedRetrieveU.description: Line items of a supplier credit.

product.title: Product / Service
product.description: ID of the associated product / service.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 4 decimal places.

unit_measure.title: Unit of measurement
unit_measure.description:
The `symbol` of the corresponding unit of measurement. You may use the symbol of any custom unit, however the following options are always available:
ValueDescription
itemItem
serviceService
mm2Square millimetre
cm2Square centimetre
m2Square metre
km2Square kilometre
mmMillimetre
cmCentimetre
mMetre
kmKilometre
mlMillilitre
lLitre
mgMilligram
grGram
kgKilogram
tTon
minuteMinute
hourHour
monthMonth
yearYear
man-hourMan-Hour
man-dayMan-Day
man-monthMan-Month
kilowatt-hourKilowatt hour
packagePackage
boxBox
m3Cubic metre
dayDay

unit_value.title: Unit value
unit_value.description: Used in the "initial" calculation mode. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

unit_discount.title: Unit discount
unit_discount.description: Absolute value, not percentage. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes that apply to this line.

unit_total.title: Unit total
unit_total.description: Used in the "total" calculation mode. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

item_net.title: Item net value
item_net.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

expense_category.title: Expense category
expense_category.description: ID of the associated expense category.

accounts.description: A list of myDATA classifications that apply to this line.

vat_exemption_category.title: VAT exemption category
vat_exemption_category.description:
Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
1Without VAT - article 2 & 3 of the VAT code
2Without VAT - article 5 of the VAT code
3Without VAT - article 13 of the VAT code
4Without VAT - article 14 of the VAT code
5Without VAT - article 16 of the VAT code
6Without VAT - article 19 of the VAT code
7Without VAT - article 22 of the VAT code

10Without VAT - article 26 of the VAT code
11Without VAT - article 27 of the VAT code

13Without VAT - article 27.1.g - Seagoing Vessels of the VAT code
14Without VAT - article 28 of the VAT code
15Without VAT - article 39 of the VAT code
16Without VAT - article 39a of the VAT code
17Without VAT - article 40 of the VAT code
18Without VAT - article 41 of the VAT code
19Without VAT - article 47 of the VAT code
20VAT included - article 43 of the VAT code
21VAT included - article 44 of the VAT code
22VAT included - article 45 of the VAT code
23VAT included - article 46 of the VAT code
24VAT included - article 6 of the VAT code
25Without VAT - POL. 1029/1995
26Without VAT - POL. 1167/2015
27Other VAT exceptions
28Without VAT -Article 24 (b) (1) of the VAT Code (Tax Free)
29Without VAT -Article 47b of the VAT Code (OSS non-EU scheme)
30Without VAT -Article 47c of the VAT Code (OSS EU scheme)
31Excluding VAT -Article 47d of the VAT Code (IOSS)

custom_id.title: Custom ID
custom_id.description: Assign a custom ID for easier identification and integration with external systems. This field is optional and can be used to reference records according to your own internal identifiers.

status.title: Status
status.description:
Automatically generated status. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
draftDraft
issuedIssued
partialPartially paid
paidPaid
pendingPending approval
voidVoid

draft.title: Draft
draft.description: If `true` the document is considered to be a work in progress.

documenttype.title: Document type
documenttype.description: Optionally, associate the record with a document type to denote the type of the received document. This field is required in case of a self-billed document.

mydata_document_type.title: MyDATA document type
mydata_document_type.description:
Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
5.1Credit Invoice / Associated
5.2Credit Invoice / Non-Associated

self_billed.description: Denotes whether this is a self-billed invoice. This value is auto-generated and depends on the bill's document type.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: A reference code. Usually, the document number as specified by the supplier.

date.title: Date
date.description: The issue date. Date is in the form of `YYYY-mm-dd`.

supplier_display_name.title: Supplier name
supplier_display_name.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. The supplier name as it will appear on the PDF.

supplier_profession.title: Supplier profession
supplier_profession.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. The supplier profession, as it will appear on the PDF.

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of a supplier credit.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

paid.title: Paid
paid.description: Total paid amount. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

template.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. The template to use when rendering to PDF.

exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate
exchange_rate.description: Comes into effect when the currency of the transaction is different than the base currency. Will always equal 1.00 for the base currency. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

calculator_mode.title: Value calculator mode
calculator_mode.description:
Automatically calculate / correct document values based on the specified calculation mode. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
initialTax exclusive
totalTax inclusive

items.description: Line items of a supplier credit.

initial.title: Initial value
initial.description: Total initial value, before any discount is applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

net.title: Net value
net.description: Total net value, before any taxes are applied. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

taxes.description: A list of taxes to be applied (**optional**). If the document contains taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may optionally resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other taxes. You may also include additional taxes, which will be calculated based on the total net amount of the document.

total.title: Total value
total.description: Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

withholding_taxes.description: A list of withholding taxes to be applied. If the document contains withholding taxes that have already been applied at the line level, you may **optionally** resend them here. This will help specify the order that these taxes will have among the other withholding taxes.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total payable amount. Automatically calculated amount. This amount may differ from the total amount in case withholding taxes have been applied. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

paid.title: Paid
paid.description: Total paid amount. Automatically calculated amount. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

template.title: Template
template.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. The template to use when rendering to PDF.

public_notes.title: Public notes
public_notes.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. These notes will appear on the PDF.

trackingcategories.description: An optional list of tracking categories to classify this record.

paid_on_receipt.title: Paid on receipt
paid_on_receipt.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 2 decimal places.

payment_method.title: Payment method
payment_method.description:
Available only when myDATA integration is enabled. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
1Domestic Payments Account
2Foreign Payments Account
3Cash
4Cheque
6Web Banking
7POS / e-POS
8IRIS Direct Payment

related_documents.description: A list of invoice IDs linked to this credit document. This information is solely for display purposes, it will appear on the PDF

items.title: Related documents
items.description: A list of invoice IDs linked to this credit document. This information is solely for display purposes, it will appear on the PDF

mydata_uid.title: UID
mydata_uid.description: Available only when myDATA integration is enabled.

mydata_qr_url.title: Mydata qr url
mydata_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a myDATA-hosted public page for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the Elorus integration.

mydata_latest_mark.title: Mydata latest mark
mydata_latest_mark.description: Unique submission ID from myDATA that indicates this document has been submitted.

mydata_latest_cancel_mark.title: Mydata latest cancel mark
mydata_latest_cancel_mark.description: If the latest submission has been canceled, this is the cancellation ID.

mydata_submission_status.title: Mydata submission status
mydata_submission_status.description:
Document status in relation to myDATA. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
sentThe document has been submitted to myDATA
not_sentThe document has not been submitted to myDATA yet
wont_sendThe document is subject to myDATA submission, but the user has explicitly requested that it not be sent via Elorus (e.g., it has already been submitted through another channel)
not_applicableThe document is not subject to myDATA submission

mydata_submission_channel.title: MyDATA submission channel
mydata_submission_channel.description:
One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
elorusElorus
impactIMPACT EINVOICING
softoneSoftOne EINVOICING

authentication_code.title: Authentication code
authentication_code.description: The authentication code is a unique identifier provided when a document is submitted to myDATA through a certified e-invoicing provider. This code ensures the authenticity of the document and can be used to verify its submission and validity within the e-invoicing service.

einvoicing_provider_qr_url.title: Einvoicing provider qr url
einvoicing_provider_qr_url.description: This is the URL to a public page hosted by the electronic invoicingservice provider for verifying the document. It should be included as a QR code on the document's PDF.This field contains information if the document has been submitted to myDATA via the certified einvoicing provider.

permalink.title: Permalink
permalink.description: Applies only to self-billed invoices. Public URL for clients.

title.title: Title
title.description: A unique title for this tax.

tax_type.title: Tax type
tax_type.description:
Denote if this is a special tax. One of the following or blank (empty string):
List of values
ValueDescription
vatVAT
withholdingWithholding tax

value_mode.title: Value mode
value_mode.description:
How the tax value should be calculated. One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
percentagePercentage
fixedFixed amount
dynamicVariable amount

operand.title: Operand
operand.description:
Controls whether this a tax (positive value) or a deduction (negative value). One of the following:
List of values
ValueDescription
++
--

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: The tax percentage does not apply to fixed taxes, where a flat `amount` is used instead. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

amount.title: Fixed amount
amount.description: Applicable only when this is a fixed tax, in which case the `percentage` field will have no effect. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

per_unit.title: Depends on quantity
per_unit.description: Applicable only when this is a fixed tax. If selected, the tax amount is calculated by multiplying the applied document item's quantity with tax amount.

subject_to_vat.title: Subject to VAT
subject_to_vat.description: Should VAT taxes include this tax when calculating their tax amount?

apply_on_document_lines.title: Can be applied on document lines
apply_on_document_lines.description: Typically, withholding taxes are being applied on the total net value of a document. This field dictates if a withholding tax can also be applied on the line level. The field does not have any effect on taxes other than withholding taxes.

aade_type.title: AADE type
aade_type.description:

ValueDescription
0Other / Not applicable
1ΦΠΑ 24% (Κανονικός)

23Χαρτόσημο 3,6%

29Τέλος συνδρομητικής τηλεόρασης 10%
30Τέλος συνδρομητών σταθερής τηλεφωνίας 5%
31OSS VAT
32Ξενοδοχεία 1-2 αστέρων (Νοέμβριος έως Φεβρουάριος)
33Ξενοδοχεία 3 αστέρων (Νοέμβριος έως Φεβρουάριος)

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: The tax percentage does not apply to fixed taxes, where a flat `amount` is used instead. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 6 decimal places.

amount.title: Fixed amount
amount.description: Applicable only when this is a fixed tax, in which case the `percentage` field will have no effect. Decimal rendered as string, with the `.` character used as a floating point. Up to 5 decimal places.

per_unit.title: Depends on quantity
per_unit.description: Applicable only when this is a fixed tax. If selected, the tax amount is calculated by multiplying the applied document item's quantity with tax amount.

subject_to_vat.title: Subject to VAT
subject_to_vat.description: Should VAT taxes include this tax when calculating their tax amount?

apply_on_document_lines.title: Can be applied on document lines
apply_on_document_lines.description: Typically, withholding taxes are being applied on the total net value of a document. This field dictates if a withholding tax can also be applied on the line level. The field does not have any effect on taxes other than withholding taxes.
